articles.title: Judge rules Musk's tweets over taking Tesla private were false, investors say
articles.description: A federal judge has ruled that Tesla CEO Elon Musk's 2018 tweets about having secured financing to take the company private were false, according to court filings by Tesla investors suing the billionaire over the tweets.
articles.content:
The filing said that the court ruled Apr 1
that Musk's 2018 tweets were "false and misleading." The court
"held that he recklessly made the statements with knowledge as to their
falsity," it said.… [+1605 chars]
